reference.shortdesc: A description is a statement that describes or contains additional information about an object.

div.p: The following list outlines common uses of the desc element:

dlentry.dd: Provides more information than can be contained in the title
Provides a description of the target
Provides alternate content to use when the context does not permit displaying the object

div.p: The following list outlines common uses of the description component:

dlentry.dd: Provides more information than can be contained in the title
Provides a description of the target

div.p: When used in conjunction with fig or table elements, processors SHOULD consider the content of desc elements to be part of the content flow.
When used in conjunction with xref or link elements, processors MAY choose to render the content of desc elements as hover help.
When used in conjunction with figures, processors SHOULD consider the content of description components to be part of the content flow.
When used in conjunction with cross references, processors MAY choose to render the content of description components as hover help.
